featured.text: The idea was developed when a Spanish designer travelling to the Philippines observed a traditional Filipino shirt 22 together with the fibers of pineapple leaves.

definition.zh_def: 菲律賓是一個位於東南亞的群島國家，由超過7000個島嶼組成，首都為馬尼拉。
definition.en_def: The Philippines is an archipelago nation in Southeast Asia, consisting of over 7,000 islands, with Manila as its capital.
definition.example: I plan to visit the Philippines next summer to explore its beautiful beaches.
